titleStmt.title: A new light-house at Milford for the great pilots of England, for their safety, as well to avoyd the unremovable rock, Eliot, from their doore here, as to beware of the bishop and his clerks neer their harbour there.
titleStmt.author: Beech, William.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end of preface and end of work : William Beech.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
